Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-65637 affecting package flannel for versions less than 0.14.0-27
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-65637 affecting package flannel for versions less than 0.14.0-27. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package flannel is earlier than 0.14.0-27, affected by CVE-2025-65637
